name: Toy Seeker
description: Toy Seeker is an interesting game in which you have to perform tasks for finding different toys. The game has 4 levels of difficult tasks: Training, where you can try the game and practice in finding toys. Easy, where you will look for toys on pictures. Medium and complex, where you need to find toys by name. But be vigilant, because you have limited time! Every time toys become more and more! And for each correct and rapid finding of toys you are charged extra time.
